title: Musical Instruments
description: Musical Instruments introduces readers to various types of musical instruments from around the world. Readers will readily recognize familiar instruments, such as the piano and violin. They will also have great fun showing off their new vocabulary. For example, can anyone guess where the gusle is played?
meta: amplifiers, bow, brass, keyboard, percussion, strings, woodwinds
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Commas : Use commas in a series
Content Vocabulary : Understand and recognize content vocabulary

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
